module.name: InterfaceBase
module.short: Provides an platform independent widgetset and helper functions.

element.name: TLCLWndMethod
element.short: The type of all LCL message handlers.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcCanDrawOutsideOnPaint
element.short: Supports drawing outside OnPaint event of an control.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcNeedMininimizeAppWithMainForm
element.short: When main form is minimized, then minimize also app.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcApplicationTitle
element.short: Can change application title at runtime.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcApplicationWindow
element.short: Application has a special root window.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcDragDockStartOnTitleClick
element.short: Can drag-dock forms from the title bar.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcAntialiasingEnabledByDefault
element.short: Is amDontCare = amOn for the widgetset.

element.name: TLCLCapability.lcReceivesLMClearCutCopyPasteReliably
element.short: In Carbon we do not receive LM_CLEAR, CUT, COPY, PASTE etc. reliably, and this affects DB controls.

element.name: TDialogButton.ModalResult
element.short: The modal result, returned when the button is clicked.

element.name: TDialogButtons.FindButton
element.short: Find the button associated with (one of) the given modal result.

element.name: TDialogButtons.FindButton.Order
element.short: List of modal results to find.

element.name: TDialogButtons.DefaultButton
element.short: The Default button for this dialog kind.

element.name: TDialogButtons.CancelButton
element.short: The Cancel button for this dialog kind.

element.name: TDialogButtons.Items
element.short: Indexed access to the button descriptions.

element.name: TWSTimerProc
element.short: Type of a timer callback procedure

element.name: TWidgetSet
element.short: Application helper class (platform and drawing interface).

descr.p: The declaration contains a number of specific methods for interfacing with the operating system.
